title: Paws
creator_credit: Karl Zwicky, Vicki Watson, Andrena Finlay, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Latent Image Productions, AFFC and PolyGram Film International
brief_description: Zac (Nathan Cavaleri) never wanted a dog, until he met a special dog called PC. PC’s master, Alex, is murdered by the evil associates of his ex wife, Anja. Anja and Alex used to live in Iceland where Alex wrote computer programs; the only problem was that Anja stole her husband’s programs and sold them. Alex managed to escape to Australia with 1 million dollars and PC. Before his death Alex attaches a computer disc to PC’s collar and sends him off to a friend. PC ends up in the care of her neighbour, Zac. Through the assistance of a computer which translates dog noises into a human voice, Zac and PC become quickly become friends as they try and avoid Anja and find the 1 million dollars before her. Also starring Norman Kaye, Sandy Gore, Caroline Gillmer, Emilie Francois and Billy Connolly as the voice of PC.
creator_credit_for_label: Karl Zwicky, Vicki Watson, Andrena Finlay, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Latent Image Productions, AFFC and PolyGram Film International
